items.name: Client
items.quote: Fast delivery and very clear communication. The site feels light and professional.

items.name: Partner
items.quote: Ads-ready structure and SEO from the start. Way above average quality.

items.name: Client
items.quote: Premium look and excellent mobile experience. Lead conversion became easier.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: It depends on scope. Landing pages are faster; business websites involve more steps.

items.question: Is SEO included?
items.answer: Yes. We include technical SEO, sitemap, metadata, OpenGraph and performance best practices.

items.question: Can I use it for ads?
items.answer: Yes. The layout is built for conversion, with CTAs, campaign sections and ad-focused pages.

items.question: Does it work internationally?
items.answer: Yes. The project starts with PT/EN and is ready to expand to more languages.
